item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 28, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (839 points | 453 comments)
2. Show HN: Myphotos.site – Make a gallery website from Google Photos (86 points | 34 comments)
3. Writing Composable SQL Using Knex and Pipelines (8 points | discuss)

7. You can use C-Reduce for any language (397 points | 89 comments)
8. A Pretty Visualisation of the European Power Grid (2022) (5 points | 1 comment)
9. In Praise of Print: Reading Is Essential in an Era of Epistemological Collapse (176 points | 154 comments)
10. Conversational Game Theory (95 points | 31 comments)

20. The Forgotten Story of How IBM Invented the Automated Fab (138 points | 29 comments)
21. Qodo automatically verifies PR complies with Jira ticket or GitHub issue (4 points | 4 comments)
22. Show HN: Feels Like Paper (212 points | 78 comments)
23. Developing a cancer drug without Big Pharma: this hospital shows it can be done (142 points | 98 comments)
24. Float Self-Tagging (144 points | 25 comments)
25. Show HN: Voice-Pro – AI Voice Cloning Magic: Transform Any Voice in 15 Seconds (173 points | 108 comments)
26. Australia to ban under-16s from social media after passing landmark law (11 points | 4 comments)
27. Shallow sports and deep social hierarchies: pecking orders aren't equal (27 points | 24 comments)
28. Structured Editing and Incremental Parsing (96 points | 25 comments)
29. Hetzner cuts traffic on US VPSs (202 points | 140 comments)
30. Where Glaciers Melt, the Rivers Run Red (42 points | 51 comments)
